resources.string: Udinga ukusebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza kanye ukuze ukwazi ukufinyelela ikhamera ngemuva

Ku-Android 11+, ngaphambi kokuqala ukurekhoda ngemuva, uhlelo lokusebenza kufanele lusebenze futhi lubonakale okungenani kanye ukuze lukwazi ukusebenzisa ikhamera engemuva. Ngakho-ke, ngemva kokuqalisa kabusha idivayisi, yenza uhlelo lokusebenza lubonakale futhi ngemva kwalokho ungavali isevisi yokuqopha, kufanele ihlale esikhungweni sezaziso.
I-Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo kumile ngoba ikhamera isetshenziswa olunye uhlelo lokusebenza

Ikhamera ibisetshenziswa olunye uhlelo lokusebenza. Sicela ungasebenzisi ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza okungenzeka zisebenzisa ikhamera ngenkathi uqopha ividiyo. I-Android ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza olulodwa kuphela ukusebenzisa ikhamera ngesikhathi
Ikhamera okwamanje (beyikade) ayitholakali ukuze ivuleke kudivayisi yakho (iphutha lesistimu yekhamera)
Le divayisi ayinayo ikhamera eyakhelwe ngaphakathi futhi ayisekeli amakhamera angaphandle. Iyavala…
Ukuze ususe izikhangiso, umnikelo kufanele ube noma ngaphezulu.
Ulwazi lokuthenga alukalayishwa okwamanje. Ingabe uku-inthanethi futhi ungene ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google\?
Gcina nyanga zonke (azikho izikhangiso zanoma yiliphi inani)
Uhlelo lokusebenza alukhishiwe ekulungiselelweni kwebhethri. Uma ikhamera ingasebenzi ngemuva noma okunye kungasebenzi, ngeza lolu hlelo lokusebenza kokuhlukile kwemodi yokonga amandla.
Uma uphinde wafaka uhlelo ku-Android 11, amafayela amadala kufanele asuswe ngesandla
Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri -> Zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza -> Igama lalolu hlelo lokusebenza -> Ungalungisi/ulondoloze
Vala izintandokazi zohlelo lokusebenza ngaphambi kokuqala ukurekhoda
Yehlulekile ukuvula imakrofoni, ukurekhoda kuzoqhubeka ngaphandle komsindo
Ayikwazanga ukuvula lezi zilungiselelo kulolu hlelo lokusebenza, sicela uzame ukuzithola usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza oluzenzakalelayo lwezilungiselelo zedivayisi

Kubonakala sengathi ulufakile kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza. Unamavidiyo amadala uhlelo lokusebenza olungakwazi ukuwasusa ngesikhathi sokurekhoda. Wasuse mathupha esikrinini sevidiyo ngaphambi kokurekhoda amavidiyo amasha. Kusukela ku-Android 11+, uhlelo lokusebenza lulahlekelwa amalungelo okufinyelela kumafayela amadala ngemva kokufakwa kabusha. Noma unganikeza imvume yokubhala kufolda yokurekhoda
Ifolda engavumelekile. Sicela ungashintshi indlela. Kufanele unikeze imvume yefolda ethile. Ungashintsha ifolda yokurekhoda kuzilungiselelo.
Sicela ufake uhlelo lokusebenza lwewebhu ukuze uvule isixhumanisi
Yehlulekile ukususa ifayela levidiyo. Kungenzeka ukuthi ulufake kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza futhi imvume yefayela yalahleka, sicela uzame ukulikhipha mathupha
Khulula isikhala ukuze uqhubeke uqopha ividiyo
Vala ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza usebenzisa ikhamera bese uqala kabusha lolu hlelo lokusebenza
Ifolda yokurekhoda ishintshiwe. Ngoba imvume yokugcina (yokubhala) ayitholakali noma ayikho

Susa amavidiyo amadala, fometha ikhadi lakho le-SD, noma uzame elinye. Futhi, khawulela indawo enkulu yokuqopha ividiyo (okuncane kungcono). Inani elikhulu lamavidiyo alondoloziwe lingabangela izinkinga ezinjalo. Bona futhi i-FAQ mayelana namakhadi e-SD kokuthi Izilungiselelo /Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa. Ungazama nokubhalela imemori yefoni esikhundleni sekhadi langaphandle
Misa ukurekhoda. Ayikho inkumbulo eyanele ukuqhubeka
Qala umise ukurekhoda, bese ungavala isevisi
Sicela ulinde isekhondi ngaphambi kokumisa ukurekhoda ngokushesha ngemva kokuqala
Ukuze ushintshe ikhamera, kufanele umise ukurekhoda kwamanje
Ukuvala le sevisi, qala unciphise noma uvale uhlelo lokusebenza
Usayizi wawo wonke amavidiyo asuka kusayizi ovunyelwe
Awekho amandla ebhethri anele kudivayisi. Khokha noma uqale ukurekhoda uma inkokhiso ingaphezulu kuka-1%%
Iphekhi yolimi ye-TTS (Android Text-to-Speech) ayifakiwe. Vula i-inthanethi ukuze uqale ukulanda
Umise isevisi yangemuva yokuqalisa ividiyo ngokuzenzakalelayo. Vula uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Background Video Recorder ukuze uluqalise futhi.
Chofoza kusaziso ukuze uqalise uhlelo lokusebenza. Awunayo imvume phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza noma idivayisi ikhiyiwe
Yehlulekile ukuqala isevisi yokurekhoda ekuqaliseni idivayisi
Isevisi yokurekhoda yehlulekile ukuqala. Thepha ukuze ukhubaze ukulungiselelwa kwebhethri kulolu hlelo lokusebenza
Umsindo uyadingeka ukuze urekhode ithrekhi yomsindo lapho uqopha ividiyo
Ikhamera iyadingeka ukuze kuqoshwe ividiyo kanye nokuhlola kuqala kwekhamera.
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza ludinga imvume yokusebenzisa ikhamera ukurekhoda ividiyo. Kodwa wenqaba. Iyavala… Zama ukunikeza imvume kukhamera kuzilungiselelo zesistimu zalolu hlelo lokusebenza
Uma uhlelo lokusebenza luncishiswa, lisebenzisa indawo engemuva ukudweba izixhumanisi, ikheli, nesivinini kuvidiyo erekhodiwe.
Isitoreji siyadingeka ukuze ulondoloze ividiyo kufolda eyabelwe kanye nemodi yokuqopha loop
Qala ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo ngokuzenzakalelayo uma uhlelo luqala
Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri kungase kuvimbele uhlelo lokusebenza ekusebenzeni kahle (isibonelo, ukusebenzisa ikhamera). Chofoza lapha ukuze uyivale kulolu hlelo lokusebenza manje
Susa ngokuzenzakalelayo amavidiyo amadala ngenkathi uqopha uma singekho isikhala esanele samavidiyo amasha
Indawo yevidiyo (gcina ifolda), ubude bevidiyo, ukuqoshwa kweluphu, usayizi wevidiyo omkhulu
Linganisela uhlelo lokusebenza ku-Google Play Isitolo
Umthamo omkhulu wememori wawo wonke amavidiyo (ukurekhoda kweluphu)
Cindezela ngokushesha esikrinini, iwindi le-pop-up, ukudlidliza ekurekhodweni, isixwayiso somsindo, izinkinobho ezisesikrinini, ukuvala isikrini nokunye.
Ishintsha ngokuzenzakalela izindlela zekhamera zemini /zasebusuku ngezikhathi ezithile
I-bitrate ephezulu - ikhwalithi engcono, kodwa usayizi wefayela wevidiyo omkhulu

I-FPS eyengeziwe - ividiyo ebushelelezi, kodwa ibhethri liphela ngokushesha. Kungcono ukusetha inani lokuqala libe eliphansi kakhulu (eyesibili lingase libe phezulu) ukuze kuqoshwe kangcono ebumnyameni
Thumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza kubangani bakho
Izinkinobho zokushintsha amakhamera, ukuvula /ukuvala ukuqoshwa komsindo, i-flash, imodi yasebusuku, ukuvimba ividiyo ekubhalweni ngaphezulu
Ibonisa iwindi elinezinkinobho zokulawula phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza
Ayisekelwe ikhamera yamanje. Abakhiqizi bavame ukukhawulela ukusetshenziswa kwayo - itholakala kuphela kuhlelo lokusebenza olujwayelekile lwekhamera
Umsindo ekuqaleni, ima noma iphutha lokurekhoda
Bika iphutha, ukuphahlazeka noma wenze umnikelo
Vumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ukuthi luvele phezu kwazo zonke ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza. Lokhu kuyadingeka ukuze ubonise iwindi elintantayo
Isibuko esivundlile sevidiyo. Isithombe sishintsha kuphela ekurekhodweni kwevidiyo, ukubuka kuqala akushintshi

Rekhoda ngefomethi ye-HEVC (H.265) ukuze wonge isikhala. Ungase ungakwazi ukudlala amavidiyo anjalo kwezinye izisetshenziswa zokudlala amavidiyo noma izinhlelo zokusebenza. Izosetha kabusha ukulungiswa kanye ne-bitrate ngemva koshintsho
Ukulungiswa, isilinganiso sebhithi, umumo, ukugxila, ikhamera, imodi yasebusuku
Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo entsha ngomsindo oqoshiwe sekuqalile
Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo entsha kuqale ngaphandle kokurekhoda komsindo

Isevisi yohlelo lokusebenza lokuqalisa/lokumisa ukurekhoda ayikwazanga ukuqalwa ngoba SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (bonisa phezu kwawo wonke amanye amawindi ohlelo lokusebenza) imvume ayizange inikezwe. Noma idivayisi ibikhiyiwe ngaleso sikhathi (umkhawulo we-Android ukuthi idivayisi kufanele iqale ivulwe futhi isikrini sayo kufanele sivulwe ngaphambi kokuthi isevisi yokuqopha ividiyo ezenzakalelayo iqale)
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa leli fayela levidiyo\?
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lawa mafayela evidiyo\?
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le folda yevidiyo\?
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa idatha yefolda yevidiyo\?
Vimbela le vidiyo ekususweni ngokuzenzakalela (bhala phezu)\?
Sicela uvule izilungiselelo zohlelo bese uvumela ukufinyelela endaweni yokugcina kumemori yefoni
Isiginali ekuqaleni kokuqoshwa kwefayela levidiyo elilandelayo
Siza ukuthuthukisa noma ukulungisa ukuhumushwa kombhalo ngolimi lwakho
Kwenzeke iphutha ngenkathi ufinyelela ikhamera. Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri kunikwe amandla
Khubaza ukulungiselelwa kwebhethri kwalolu hlelo lokusebenza kuzilungiselelo zedivayisi yakho ukuze ugweme amaphutha ekhamera azayo
Ukudlidliza lapho uqala noma umisa ukurekhoda
Qala noma yeka ukurekhoda ngokucindezela inkinobho yevolumu yokwehlisa
Uhlelo lokusebenza luzosebenza ngemuva (lwethulwe kubha yesaziso) ukuze lesi sici sisebenze
Khansela ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo okuzenzakalelayo kwesibali sikhathi samanje\?
Isevisi yesibali sikhathi sokuqala okuzenzakalelayo kokuqoshwa kwevidiyo
